name: Ebony & Ivory Tower
description:
Welcome to Ebony & Ivory Tower

Pick a piece of the colour indicated in the top right corner and place it on top of the tower, and try not to collapse it!

WASD or arrow keys to look around, mouse (LMB) to move pieces.

You can play in single-player mode for points and compete in the online leaderboard or you can challenge a friend in hotseat two-player mode.
